oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from C. L. Morris to cousins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Morris provides his cousins with news of the deaths of his mother and Laura [relationship unstated]. He relates his hardships caused by the war and writes, "Life is the running of a race and Death the goal, so then let us look a head to that time when the gole [sic] of life will be ours at last"
